document.title: Health Education Standards of Learning for Virginia Public Schools

5B857B775832453588A04C0E28FC6893.description: Develop strategies to reduce water pollution.

0AC0B6B5DFDD44A684E55AEA534712DB.description:
Identify possible solutions for a community health issue and volunteer opportunities to
address the issue.

3ECFEC0C48C4402796DEFCDE3AFC1363.description:
Identify trusted adults at home, in school, and in the community who can help with
unsafe or uncomfortable situations.

CBD37A838B374B73B12FA36F8868CDAF.description: Demonstrate strategies to resolve conflict in a variety of situations.

76F690148A494EA6826080F6F076779C.description:
Promote strategies to report bullying and aggressive behaviors and to safely advocate
and stand up for others.

DB5F66E659C849BCAA3F2898CE1F7E7A.description: Describe ways to show compassion for others.

B6F208AB4F214673ADF945D93DC09145.description: Practice initiating, sustaining, and ending conversations.

40B60BA8167E4C74876F3E3C2963A7EF.description:
Explain how challenges and successes provide learning experiences to help develop a
healthy self-concept.

0C77F0680F30422091EB9EE893621A16.description:
Identify strategies and resources, including understanding the role of school counselors,
psychologists, and social workers, to manage feelings that may result from loss and
grief.

DC2107F44D3A4727AF66F759036A52E2.description: Develop strategies for safe Internet and online gaming use.

55E4C031E7784AE092545CFEF5C3AF14.description: Promote safe participation in recreational activities.

AA60A035F8EB4969B62F84BDD2DA62B1.description:
Demonstrate effective refusal skills for situations involving peer pressure to use
harmful substances.

EE1A7D9355754826A578C82B34C88C46.description:
Determine the importance of resistance/refusal skills in saying no to alcohol, tobacco,
inhalants, and other drugs.

A6609480CD534B62B76B1738BA322B1B.description: Explore methods to reduce risks associated with noncommunicable/chronic disease.

F9A71556E0F94D8095C79757A370C2ED.description: Develop a plan to prevent the spread of communicable disease.

B2BBC210AAFC43ECB651623531E0716F.description:
Create a plan to meet the daily requirement for physical activity, rest, and sleep, using
valid and reliable resources.

9238CF5DAA914D51B9204FCA252734D0.description:
Explain how serving sizes, additives, preservatives, and added sugar affect one’s health
over time (e.g., increased vulnerability to disease and obesity).

3242450AEBA74B1E9C836EBC921E1C6A.description: Design snack options that include protein, vegetables, and fruit.

DE6E709F3E694228BD2FB010CD00EC36.description:
Identify ways to moderate intake of foods high in saturated and trans fats, including
understanding the role of serving sizes.

00817701CB634DEEBBCA5EE653E1B56F.description: Describe the effects of nutrition, personal hygiene, and sleep on the immune system.

1D0303672E6A442F92226C948BB2413B.description:
The student will describe the importance of identifying and accessing health resources for
personal and community health.

2AEDE662137349F4B9EDFE5353C3194C.description: Discuss the benefits of volunteering, and identify local volunteer opportunities.

515447AAEBBA402F9DF8D97BBBA46361.description: Explain the health consequences associated with water pollution.

23AB1A712D4A4CE0A68CBBA4924D41C3.description:
Explain why bullying or teasing someone who may have different needs or abilities is
inappropriate.

7EFD6EFDFCE749B186965AE38B7327B9.description:
Explain the importance of seeking assistance from a trusted adult when in unsafe or
uncomfortable situations.

3FF084DF8EC54F408462736CA41767D1.description: Analyze positive strategies for resolving conflict.

2E4FE2809B974B3B8517F083DBFF5379.description: Explain how bullying impacts individuals and affects one’s health.

72A2A6699EF5458D92AD8328833910F6.description: Describe how developing a healthy self-concept is an ongoing and essential life skill.

AC8C41487AA84EC696506953C460DBB1.description: Describe healthy coping skills for handling the emotions of loss and grief.

605BFBD73D77417E8C314F4D557A9894.description: Explain the consequences of unsafe Internet use.

A2AC091AA82040A3945ED446D1767B55.description:
Explain the health consequences of not following safety practices for recreational
activities.

D9E5513EEA1E46B482424F14C2C02CE4.description:
Describe the effects of peer pressure on use of alcohol, tobacco, nicotine products,
marijuana, inhalants, and other drugs.

5B596736DB634AC5B608DE3C7A490C80.description:
Examine factors that can influence an individual’s decision to use or avoid alcohol,
tobacco, nicotine products, marijuana, inhalants, and other drugs.

9F4374892DF145FDB60B878A31306407.description: Explain the role of heredity in some chronic diseases.

A95EB57F11AD4FAAAD306C5C04D4FE35.description: Analyze strategies for preventing communicable diseases.

C38C2491CAAF41388A37E5D4686191F0.description: Explain how physical activity, rest, and sleep affect physical and mental health.

6C8A878F3E1E4833A3B8E497644E7C86.description:
Compare the serving sizes, additives, preservatives, sodium, and added sugar content of
a variety of foods and beverages.

A86591070D0D44B1BDE1A15B52C7E3CC.description: Identify a variety of animal and plant-based protein foods.

E45161D22285484FABE82359FA63B8D5.description: Describe the effects of saturated and trans fat on overall health.

A64FCEA5699749F3A4B75E55FA23461B.description: Describe how the immune system defends the body against germs and disease.

AD6176C648CB446797E9A87436AB1DD1.description:
The student will describe health concepts and behaviors that prevent illness, disease, and
injury and that promote positive relationships.

EA2E2970B13C4D4C919F72B6886FCC88.description: Describe the effects of water pollution on health.

AD346F52DCA045DC99846CDE76E48923.description: Describe steps to resolve a conflict.

2A0ADB50363445BEB7B0AB965AF395FA.description:
Explain the difference between teasing and taunting and when teasing and taunting can
be considered bullying.

D4DB9F3C21ED4BFDB2CEC033C3FA04A5.description: Recognize that every person is different and has different needs.

DCC2009CB55046D4B36330F149A611D0.description:
Identify effective verbal and nonverbal communication skills (e.g., speaking, listening,
eye contact, body language).

8CFDC31C5FC946F986F61C1A7FE601FA.description: Describe self-concept and how it can be influenced by internal and external factors.

F67DD90565FD48769ED615FF4C029F8C.description:
Identify feelings and emotions associated with loss and grief and their impact on one’s
health.

8481C3E46ED04024B840D04A2E7687CB.description: Describe safe and unsafe use of the Internet, including online gaming.

C86FE5C3B0E247C98E664D8503F04012.description:
Explain appropriate protective gear when engaged in physical activities such as cycling,
rollerblading, skateboarding, and water sports.

FF20EAE5A90542DD82A4FFD6ADF0F9FE.description:
Identify effective verbal and nonverbal communication skills to resist/refuse alcohol,
tobacco, nicotine products, marijuana, inhalants, and other drugs.

4749B5284A5E4C9AB7A82EB311BEA828.description:
Compare the short- and long-term consequences of the use of alcohol, tobacco, nicotine
products, marijuana, inhalants, and other drugs.

D60277F3435642F599692269BBBF7787.description: Describe the types and causes of noncommunicable/chronic diseases.

9EE91EA02A4F4F06B9AEBA453D57852F.description:
Describe causes of communicable disease (i.e., how viruses, bacteria, parasites, and
fungi are spread).

29AC57B99B2F43BD93A8CBFF2438E454.description: Describe the benefits of rest, sleep, and a physically active lifestyle.

0B9F60AEBFD9435DBA33A20912C69DB3.description:
Determine how serving sizes, additives, preservatives, sodium, and added sugar content
for a variety of foods and beverages affect health.

73C9D3AA16C449E397722272ECF21DDC.description: Describe the importance of protein for growth and development.

3E681374E129480C83DC93FA062B0530.description: Identify foods that contain saturated and trans fat.

766D7DD5AB114EBE9C48051D297D0137.description: Identify the major structures and functions of the immune system.

F45ECE7EA1714755A9186F182B637941.description:
The student will explain how nutrition and other health-enhancing behaviors affect
personal health and academic achievement.
